comment: Exposes radio related information about the current device.

variables.name: sHaveAccessNetworkState
variables.comment: Cached value indicating if app has ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE permission.

variables.name: sHaveAccessWifiState
variables.comment: Cached value indicating if app has ACCESS_WIFI_STATE permission.

methods.name: private static boolean isSupported()
methods.comment:
* Return whether the current SDK supports necessary functions and the app
     * has necessary permissions.
     * @return True or false.

methods.name: private static boolean isWifiConnected()
methods.comment:
* Return whether the device is currently connected to a wifi network.
     * @return True or false.

methods.name: private static int getCellSignalLevel()
methods.comment:
* Return current cell signal level.
     * @return Signal level from 0 (no signal) to 4 (good signal) or -1 in case of error.

methods.name: private static int getCellDataActivity()
methods.comment:
* Return current cell data activity.
     * @return 0 - none, 1 - in, 2 - out, 3 - in/out, 4 - dormant, or -1 in case of error.
